subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory Sabbatini could face suspension from the PGA Tour for what was described as a profanity-laced argument with Sean O’Hair last week at the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La.
snippet: Rory Sabbatini could face suspension from the PGA Tour for what was described as a profanity-laced argument with Sean O’Hair last week at the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La.
